trans-unit.source: The type of the media element, can be video or audio.
trans-unit.target: The type of the media element, can be video or audio.

trans-unit.source: Optinal caption for the media element
trans-unit.target: Optinal caption for the media element

trans-unit.source: An optional short description of the media file, e.g. information about author / source of the media file.
trans-unit.target: An optional short description of the media file, e.g. information about author / source of the media file.

trans-unit.source: Insert the MP3 version of your audio file here. Optionally you can also add an ogg version for increased browser support.
trans-unit.target: Insert the MP3 version of your audio file here. Optionally you can also add an ogg version for increased browser support.

trans-unit.source: Optional OGG version of your audio file. It should contain the same audio data as the selected MP3 file. Use this for increased browser support.
trans-unit.target: Optional OGG version of your audio file. It should contain the same audio data as the selected MP3 file. Use this for increased browser support.

trans-unit.source: Insert the h.264 version of your medie file here. Optionall you can also add an OGV or a WebM version to increase browser support.
trans-unit.target: Insert the h.264 version of your medie file here. Optionall you can also add an OGV or a WebM version to increase browser support.

trans-unit.source: Optional OGV version of your video file. It should contain the same video data as the selected h.264 file. Use this for increased browser support.
trans-unit.target: Optional OGV version of your video file. It should contain the same video data as the selected h.264 file. Use this for increased browser support.

trans-unit.source: Optional WebM version of your video file. It should contain the same video data as the selected h.264 file. Use this for increased browser support.
trans-unit.target: Optional WebM version of your video file. It should contain the same video data as the selected h.264 file. Use this for increased browser support.
